      public void setCancelled(boolean toCancel)
      Cancels the trade. Note the client will need to close and reopen the trade window to, for example, see that a canceled trade is not sold out.

    • getIngredientOneDiscountedPrice

      public int getIngredientOneDiscountedPrice()
      The actual amount of ingredient one charged for a single 'order'; e.g. the price after all gossip/player-reputation and hero of the village effects have been applied. Note that only the first ingredient is discounted by the villager.
      Returns:
      amount of item 1 each order actually cost.

    • getIngredientOneTotalAmount

    • getIngredientTwoTotalAmount

      public int getIngredientTwoTotalAmount()
      The total amount of recipe.getIngredients().get(1) spent, or zero if no ingredient 2

      public int getAmountPurchased()

    • getAmountLost

      public int getAmountLost()
      When the player does not have inventory space for all of the items purchased they may drop or simply be lost. I've seen both happen.
